name: Peanut Peeled (Vaja Cheena Badam)
description:
Peanut Peeled (Vaja Cheena Badam) 100 gm is a popular snack and cooking ingredient that offers a range of health benefits. Sourced from high-quality peanuts, this product is produced in Bangladesh and is commonly available for around BDT 55.  Key Ingredients: The product contains only peeled peanuts, with no added preservatives or artificial flavors. Uses:Culinary Uses: Ideal for snacking, adding to salads, or using in recipes such as stir-fries or desserts. It can also be ground into peanut butter or incorporated into various savory and sweet dishes. Health Benefits: Rich in protein, fiber, healthy fats, and essential vitamins and minerals, peanuts help improve heart health by lowering cholesterol, protecting against age-related cognitive decline, and promoting overall well-being. They are especially known for boosting memory and reducing the risk of heart disease and certain cancers.

They are especially known for boosting memory and reducing the risk of heart disease and certain cancers.

name: Almonds (Kath Badam)
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from USA. Almonds are a fantastic source of antioxidants. Nuts are low in carbs but high in healthy fats, protein, and fiber. The magnesium in almonds may additionally help lower blood pressure levels. Almonds Can Lower Cholesterol Levels.  Eating Almonds Reduces Hunger, Lowering Your Overall Calorie Intake  Almonds boast an impressive nutrient profile. A 1-ounce (28-gram) serving of almonds contains : • Fiber: 3.5 grams  • Protein: 6 grams • Fat: 14 grams (9 of which are monounsaturated) • Vitamin E: 37% of the RDI  • Manganese: 32% of the RDI • Magnesium: 20% of the RDI  • They also contain a decent amount of copper, vitamin B2 (riboflavin) and phosphorus.
This product is manufactured/packaged in Bangladesh and its raw materials are collected from USA.

name: Act II Popcorn Golden Sizzle
description:
Act II Popcorn Golden Sizzle 50g offers a deliciously crispy and flavorful popcorn snack, seasoned with a special blend of savory spices for a mouthwatering experience. This easy-to-make popcorn is perfect for snacking during movie time, parties, or anytime you crave a light, crunchy treat. Ingredients:Popped CornVegetable OilSaltSugarArtificial FlavorsSpices Quick & Easy: Ready to enjoy in just a few minutes, perfect for a fast snack.Crispy & Tasty: A flavorful and crunchy treat that satisfies your snack cravings.Convenient: Perfect for on-the-go snacking or sharing with friends and family. Act II Popcorn Golden Sizzle 50g offers a flavorful and convenient snack, bringing a delightful sizzle of taste with every bite.

name: Imperial Eats Thai Peanuts
description:
Imperial Eats Thai Peanuts offer a flavorful twist on a classic snack. Roasted to perfection and coated with a zesty Thai-inspired seasoning, these peanuts deliver a perfect balance of savory, spicy, and tangy flavors. Packed with protein and essential nutrients, they provide a delicious and nutritious snack for any time of day. Whether enjoyed on their own or added to salads and dishes, Imperial Eats Thai Peanuts bring a bold, exotic taste to your snacking experience.

name: Ekata Peanut Raw (Kacha Cheena Badam)
description:
Peanuts have a strong nutritional profile. They are an excellent source of plant-based protein, fiber, and many key vitamins and minerals. Peanuts come in many forms, including roasted, salted, chocolate-coated, and peanut butter. Different types have different nutritional profiles and various health benefits. Along with their healthful nutritional profile, peanuts are calorie-rich food, so they are most healthful when enjoyed in moderation.

name: Act II Popcorn Golden Sizzle (Buy 5 Get 1)
description:

Encased within a convenient 50 gm pack, this culinary delight brings together the perfect fusion of golden goodness and sizzling taste, making it an ideal choice for your snacking moments. Each kernel is carefully chosen to ensure a uniform and satisfying popping experience, resulting in a light and airy texture that's ready to be transformed into a delightful snack.

name: Blue Diamond Almonds Honey Roasted
description:
Introducing the delectable Blue Diamond Almonds Honey Roasted, a delightful indulgence that brings together the natural sweetness of honey and the satisfying crunch of roasted almonds. Within this 170 gm package lies a snacking experience that perfectly balances the rich, comforting notes of honey with the irresistible nuttiness of almonds, creating a treat that's sure to please your taste buds.    Blue Diamond Almonds Honey Roasted presents a harmonious blend of flavors. The golden sweetness of honey lends a luscious and aromatic touch to each almond, complemented by the roasted nutty undertones that provide a satisfying texture and depth of flavor. With every bite, you'll experience the delicate sweetness followed by the hearty richness of the almonds, creating a memorable snacking journey.

name: Tong Garden Salted Cocktail Nuts
description:
Tong Garden ranks at the top in Southeast Asian markets when it comes to nuts products and snacks. Tong Garden grew into one of Asia’s greatest nut giants. Tong Garden never compromise on quality, and Tong Garden is constantly innovating to bring consumers more great-tasting snacks. Cashew nuts, broad beans, broad beans, pistachios, almonds, macadamias, sunflower kernels, honey-coated nut, Wasabi Cashew Nuts Mixed Macadamias, and most recently Almonds with Dried Cranberries and Banana Chips are the product range of Tong Garden. New products, new processes, aggressive strategies and creative use of R&D produced triple digit growth in sales between 1996 and today for Tong Garden. Fair Food & Life Style is the official distributor of Tong Garden in Bangladesh. Tong Garden has got much popularity as premium snacks for Bangladeshi with FFL.

name: Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Habanero BBQ
description:
Introducing the sensational Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Habanero BBQ, a mouthwatering delight that harmonizes the fiery zest of habanero peppers with the smoky allure of BBQ seasoning. Within this 170 gm package lies a snacking experience that marries crunchy almonds with an irresistibly bold and spicy flavor profile, sure to ignite your taste buds in every bite.Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Habanero BBQ presents an enticing blend of heat and smokiness. The habanero pepper, known for its intense spiciness, lends a fiery kick that awakens your palate, while the layers of BBQ seasoning contribute a rich, smoky complexity that balances the heat. The result is a tantalizing flavor journey that takes you from the initial burst of heat to the comforting notes of BBQ, leaving a satisfying aftertaste that keeps you coming back for more.

name: Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Wasabi & Soy Sauce
description:
Introducing the exquisite and flavorful Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Wasabi & Soy Sauce blend, a delectable treat that tantalizes your taste buds with a harmonious fusion of bold, spicy wasabi and savory soy sauce. Crafted to perfection, this 170 gm package offers a satisfyingly crunchy texture that complements the distinctive flavor profile, creating a truly irresistible snacking experience.Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Wasabi & Soy Sauce presents a balance between the fiery kick of wasabi and the rich umami notes of soy sauce. With every bite, you'll encounter the initial zing of wasabi, known for its piquant and invigorating taste, followed by the smooth and savory depth of soy sauce that lingers on your palate. This combination delivers a dynamic and indulgent flavor encounter that's perfect for those seeking a unique and memorable snack.

name: Act II Popcorn Movie Theatre Butter
description:
Act II Popcorn Movie Theatre Butter 70g is the perfect snack for movie nights, offering a buttery and rich flavor that mimics the taste of traditional movie theater popcorn. This ready-to-make popcorn is easy to prepare and provides a delicious, satisfying crunch with every bite, making it a great choice for casual snacking or entertaining guests. Ingredients:Popped CornVegetable OilButter FlavoringSaltArtificial Butter FlavourColor Additives (if applicable) Buttery Flavor: Enjoy the authentic movie theater taste with a rich, buttery finish.Quick & Convenient: Pre-packaged for easy preparation in just a few minutes.Crispy & Crunchy: The popcorn delivers a satisfying, crunchy texture for snacking enjoyment.Perfect for Movie Time: A classic snack for movie lovers or anyone seeking a flavorful treat.

name: Fit Food Roasted Cashews
description:
Roasted cashews can be a convenient and delicious snack.    Roasted cashews are healthy when eaten in moderation because they are cholesterol-free,   and they can lower your cholesterol levels because of their dietary fiber and phytosterols,   according to the Linus Pauling Institute Micronutrient Information Center. Each ounce of cashews provides 13 g total fats, including about 10 g unsaturated fats, which can lower your cholesterol levels when you eat them instead of saturated fats. Roasted cashews are also heart-healthy because of their potassium, which supports a healthy blood pressure    -Alternative Protein-Heart Health-Weight Control-Considerations.

name: Tong Garden Salted Almonds
description:
Tong Garden ranks at the top in Southeast Asian markets when it comes to nuts products and snacks. Tong Garden grew into one of Asia’s greatest nut giants. Tong Garden never compromise on quality, and Tong Garden is constantly innovating to bring consumers more great-tasting snacks. Cashew nuts, broad beans, broad beans, pistachios, almonds, macadamias, sunflower kernels, honey-coated nut, Wasabi Cashew Nuts Mixed Macadamias, and most recently Almonds with Dried Cranberries and Banana Chips are the product range of Tong Garden. New products, new processes, aggressive strategies and creative use of R&D produced triple digit growth in sales between 1996 and today for Tong Garden. Fair Food & Life Style is the official distributor of Tong Garden in Bangladesh. Tong Garden has got much popularity as premium snacks for Bangladeshi with FFL.

name: Imperial Eats Peanuts
description:
Imperial Eats Peanuts are premium, crunchy, and deliciously satisfying. Sourced from the finest peanuts, they are roasted to perfection to bring out their natural flavor. Rich in protein, healthy fats, and essential nutrients, these peanuts make for a wholesome snack anytime. Enjoy them on their own or as a versatile addition to your favorite dishes. With Imperial Eats Peanuts, you get a tasty, nutritious treat in every bite.

name: Imperial Eats Cashew Nuts
description:
Imperial Eats Cashew Nuts are a deliciously crunchy and smooth snack, crafted from the finest quality cashews. Naturally rich in protein, healthy fats, and essential vitamins, these cashews are a perfect choice for a nutritious boost throughout the day. Roasted to perfection, they offer a rich, buttery flavor that makes them ideal on their own or as a tasty addition to salads, trail mixes, or baked goods. With Imperial Eats Cashew Nuts, enjoy a wholesome, satisfying snack with every bite.
